comments:
I ran into an issue with the IC.  Some information was dumped into the .log file and some information was dumped to the console.  We have written our own little application/shell script to start/stop the Info Center.

I most cases the stack dumped to the log would be lost.  Would it be possible to dump these types or error messages (stack trace) could also be logged to the .log file so as to make it easier to diagnose issues within this framework.



Log File:
ENTRY org.eclipse.help 4 0 2007-10-01 11:36:36.234
!MESSAGE Error getting help keyword index data from provider: org.eclipse.help.internal.index.IndexFileProvider (skipping provider)
!STACK 0
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space

While the following errors appeared on the console:
